ComicInfo.Title: A Galaxy Consumed!
ComicInfo.Summary: A Galaxy Consumed!: The Black Stars threaten to consume all before them, but they are inhabited by warring factions. Battles are fought and strange alliances formed. Eventually, Thor comes face-to-face with Karaganda, Dark Lord of the Outer Realm.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 10:54:09. [CVDB14005] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:23:08. [Issue ID 27110]
ComicInfo.Letterer: Gaspar Saladino,L. P. Gregory,L. P. Gregory
ComicInfo.Characters: Thor,The Protector (introduction),Sif,Tryx,Tana Nile,Avalon (introduction): Caretakers (introduction),Silas Grant,Kragonn (introduction),Bolaa,Hildegarde,Jukka,Balder,Krista,The Masters of the Black Star(s) (introduction)
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
